channel.title: D2D Natural Resources and Data Literacy
channel.description: Recent content on D2D Natural Resources and Data Literacy

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the D2D Natural Resources abd Data Literacy Project (a part of D2D IFC Program). This website contains information and materials about our capacity building work, focused on training local communities and increasing the transparency in mining sector.

item.title: About
item.description: Program objectives: to improve utility of natural resource industry data for development impact Structure: joint WB/IFC program led by IFC Funding: $2.5 million over 2 years What do we hope to achieve? Move the needle to enable the various stakeholders to effectively re-use NR data for purposes that are relevant to them

item.title: Team
item.description: The core team of the project: Alla Morrison (Program Manager) LinkedIn, Twitter Michelle Jacome (Operations Officer) LinkedIn Delgermaa Boldbaatar (D2D Program Mongolia Coordinator) LinkedIn Oleksiy Anokhin LinkedIn, Twitter
